briefdescription.para: This request gets the USB attributes.
This request sets the USB attributes.

detaileddescription.para: This request resets the USB interface.
This request configures the USB interface.
This request sets the USB address.
This request resets the specified USB endpoint.
This request resets the USB interface.
This request resets the USB interface.
This request resets the USB interface.
This request resets the USB interface.
This request resets the USB interface.
This request sets the function to handle events.
This request checks to see if the USB is connected to an upstream port. It is connected, once is has been reset and disconnected when suspended.
USB Out event (Out from host to device)
USB In event (In to host from device)
These are the special events that can be passed to the event callback handler.
This lists the valid USB modes.
This defines the type for a USB event handler.
